brand_identity.name: Get Driven Calculator
design_principles: Nocturnal Visibility: High contrast elements against deep blacks.
Dashboard Precision: Data should look like a car's instrument cluster.
Glowing Interactions: Interactive elements should glow like dashboard lights.
Belgian Compliance: Strict adherence to Belgian salary logic in UI flow.

font_family.headings: Chivo, Unbounded, or Syne (Wide, Bold, Futuristic)
font_family.mono: JetBrains Mono or Fira Code (For financial data)

buttons.primary: bg-[#D9F99D] text-black font-bold hover:bg-[#BEF264] hover:shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(217,249,157,0.4)] transition-all duration-300 rounded-none skew-x-[-10deg] px-8
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-[#27272A] text-white hover:border-[#D9F99D] hover:text-[#D9F99D] transition-all duration-300 rounded-none skew-x-[-10deg] px-8

cards.base: bg-[#0F0F11] border border-[#27272A] p-6 rounded-xl hover:border-[#D9F99D]/30 transition-colors shadow-2xl relative overflow-hidden
cards.stat_card: flex flex-col gap-2 bg-[#0F0F11]/80 backdrop-blur-md border border-[#27272A] p-6 rounded-xl

inputs.default: bg-[#09090B] border border-[#27272A] text-white focus:border-[#D9F99D] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#D9F99D] h-12 rounded-lg px-4 placeholder:text-zinc-600 transition-all

landing_page.structure: Hero section with full-screen background image, heavy bottom gradient fade. Centered typography with 'glowing' effect. Floating 'Login' card glassmorphism.

dashboard.structure: Sidebar or Top-nav (mobile). Grid layout for 'Stat Cards'. Large chart area. List of recent rides below.

visual_enhancers.glow_effects: Use box-shadow or drop-shadow to create 'neon' light bleed on active elements.
visual_enhancers.icons: Use Lucide React icons. Stroke width: 1.5px. Size: 20px or 24px.

instructions_to_main_agent: Install 'recharts' for the earnings chart: `npm install recharts` or `yarn add recharts`.
Install 'date-fns' for date manipulation: `npm install date-fns`.
Use the dark theme class strategy configured in Tailwind.
Implement the 'Add Ride' form with a step-by-step or clean grid layout to avoid clutter.
Ensure the salary calculation logic (9h rule, 150% overtime, night surcharge) is robust and tested.
Use the 'sonner' toast library for feedback on adding rides.
Create a 'Settings' page to allow the user to tweak the rates (Future proofing).
universal_guidelines: Always use 'dark' class on the root html/body.
Do not use gradients for backgrounds, use solid deep blacks or very subtle radial gradients.
Text must be legible. Use text-zinc-400 for labels and text-white for values.
Interactive elements must have a hover state that brightens them.
